functions.description: Adds 1 to each element in a 2D range using Google Cloud Run
functions.name: ADDONE

parameters.description: The 2D range of numbers to process
parameters.name: range

result.description: 2D array with 1 added to each numeric element

functions.description: Adds a custom value to each element in a 2D range (processed locally)
functions.name: ADDVALUE

parameters.description: The 2D range of numbers to process
parameters.name: range

parameters.description: The value to add to each element (default: 1)
parameters.name: value

result.description: 2D array with the value added to each numeric element

functions.description: Test function to verify the add-in is working properly
functions.name: TEST
